line_1: He sinks apace, despis'd by Whig and Tory;
line_2: And now arriv'd at his meridian glory,

line_1: The Muses are nor Whig nor Tory:
line_2: Tho' in your Principles you glory,

line_1: I am, you know; a right true-hearted Tory,
line_2: Love a good glass, a merry song, or story.

line_1: When you behold one man both Whig and Tory.
line_2: Just such a monster, Sirs, pray think before ye,

line_1: Took vast delight in rory tory;
line_2: And Solomon, in all his glory,
